co.cask.cdap.api.service.http
Class AbstractHttpServiceHandler

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.service.http.AbstractHttpServiceHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServiceHandler
public abstract class AbstractHttpServiceHandler
extends Object
implements HttpServiceHandler

An abstract implementation of HttpServiceHandler. Classes that extend this class only have to implement a configure method which can be used to add optional arguments.

Method Detail

configure

protected void configure()
This can be overridden in child classes to add custom user properties during configure time.

configure

public final void configure(HttpServiceConfigurer configurer)
An implementation of HttpServiceHandler.configure(HttpServiceConfigurer). Stores the configurer so that it can be used later and then runs the configure method which is overwritten by children classes.

Specified by:
configure in interface HttpServiceHandler
Parameters:
configurer - the HttpServiceConfigurer which is used to configure this Handler

initialize

public void initialize(HttpServiceContext context)
                throws Exception
An implementation of HttpServiceHandler.initialize(HttpServiceContext). Stores the context so that it can be used later.

Specified by:
initialize in interface HttpServiceHandler
Parameters:
context - the HTTP service runtime context
Throws:
Exception

destroy

public void destroy()
An implementation of HttpServiceHandler.destroy() which does nothing

destroy in interface HttpServiceHandler
